: : Rodimus Prime : :

If he had been in robot mode he would have smiled. Nightlight was always thinking.

Rodimus Prime: That's a good idea, maybe it can be replicated.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 12:50 AM
  Subject: Re: artifact 1


  Nightlight::

  Nightlight smiled back when she heard Rodimus suggestion, after he 
  said the command to leave the place, she trasformed to her beast mode 
  and ran behind her mates 

  "Why don't...?"started to said Nightlight while she ran "well it's an 
  idea, why don't we try to duplicate the substance that you need to 
  eat, Vampirtron??? tying to mimic Tranformers' blood "


  --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  > : : Rodimus Prime : :
  > 
  > As he drove back he decided to take care a few other issues.
  > 
  > Rodimus Prime: We'll examine this thing further at home. And 
  Vampirtron, I wont lock you up, but I want some medical examinations 
  on you as soon as we return.
